description.0: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets none escape.

0.0: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>120.</cryo>

1.0: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>150.</cryo>

2.0: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>180.</cryo>

3.0: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>210.</cryo>

4.0: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>240.</cryo>
